question: After salaat is it ok to make duaa in sajda instead of raising your hands and is it ok to not make duaa (supplication) after your sunnah namaaz? Jazakalla Khair
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible occasionally to make an independent Sajda and make Du'aa
in it. To make Du'aa after Sunnah Salaat is not necessary.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
